mapper.insert: insert into servicer(phone, password, state, headImg, email, nickName, realName, customerServicePhone, totalOnlineTime, onlineTimeBegin, onlineTimeEnd, sessionCount, msgCount, serviceGroup, serviceRole) values(#{phone}, #{password}, #{state}, #{headImg}, #{email}, #{nickName}, #{realName}, #{customerServicePhone}, #{totalOnlineTime}, #{onlineTimeBegin}, #{onlineTimeEnd}, #{sessionCount}, #{msgCount}, #{serviceGroup}, #{serviceRole})
mapper.update: update servicer set phone = #{customerService.phone}, password = #{customerService.password}, headImg = #{customerService.headImg}, email = #{customerService.email}, nickName = #{customerService.nickName}, realName = #{customerService.realName}, customerServicePhone = #{customerService.customerServicePhone}, customerServiceId = #{customerService.totalOnlineTime}, totalOnlineTime = #{customerService.totalOnlineTime}, onlineTimeBegin = #{customerService.onlineTimeBegin}, onlineTimeEnd = #{customerService.onlineTimeEnd}, sessionCount = #{customerService.sessionCount}, msgCount = #{customerService.msgCount}, serviceGroup = #{customerService.serviceGroup}, serviceRole = #{customerService.serviceRole} where customerServiceId = #{id};
